text: “Ine sindinawauze china chilichonse kupatula zimene Inu mudandilamula kuti ndinene zoti. ‘Pembedzani Mulungu, Ambuye wanga, amene ali Ambuye wanu.’ Ine ndidali mboni yawo pamene ndidali kukhala pakati pawo koma pamene Inu mudanditenga ine kudza kwa Inu, Inuyo ndiye amene mudali kuwayang’anira ndipo Inu ndinu mboni pa zinthu zonse.”
